name: All or Nothing
text:
If your LP are lower than your opponent's: Reveal the top card of your Deck, and if it is a Level 1 or 8 monster, either add it to your hand or Special Summon it. Otherwise, your opponent can choose 1 of these effects to be applied.
? The LP of this card's controller becomes 1000.
? The opponent of this card's controller gains LP until they have 8000.
You can only activate 1 "All or Nothing" per turn.
